attributes.review: Everything on this app is fake, racist and untrue! Remove ASAP!! NO STARS! I want to rate this NO STARS!
attributes.title: Fake news!!!

attributes.review: The second I opened the app I dropped my egg salad sandwich on the floor. You know what that means. I now have bad luck for 74 years 😔Then I realized that I was trying to get Subway Surfer and not the Trump 2020 app. Now I don’t know what to eat for lunch and I can’t play my fav video game...😭🤮😣
attributes.title: App smells like OLD EGGS

attributes.review: This app is ridiculously horrible. Would not recommend at all, totally terrible.
attributes.title: Not worth it

attributes.review: When I first opened the app, I was greeted with nude pictures of the president!!!🤢🤮After that, I signed up and got a notification EVERY five minutes about how Trump was upset with something miniscule, like his pp!!! 😡🤏🏽 My phone also got a bug!😡🐜 I suppose that’s what I get for downloading an app associated with a cheeto. Anyways, NICKI MINAJ 2020 !!!!!🦄💖✨
attributes.title: disgusting app!!!!

attributes.review: so i was so excited to download the app and once i downloaded it i got so many notifications saying that i got viruses???? i was so excited to support the president and THIS happens?!?!? EXCUSE ME?? anyways don't get the app!! i keep getting pop ups and when i went on my laptop it said that 129 people were signed into my google account and could see my name and address! none of these people i knew! DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD. THIS. APP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: VIRUSES?????????????

attributes.review: This app is absolutely trash🙄. It keeps lagging like OMG. Like all trump supporters are trash and so is this app like it should be deleted and so should trump🥰💅🏾✨🧚🏼‍♂️🌸💫
attributes.title: I hate this app

attributes.review: Layout is terrible. It takes too long to load. It has crashed a few times in the first few times I tried to open it.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: i tried downloading this app, and once downloading was complete i started receiving many random links from unknown emails. i also started getting random calls asking about my car and insurance. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. it will take your private information and your phone will be obliterated with hackers.
